description: This is a one-way track for the hike from the trail head to where we stayed on the edge of Alice Lake.  We stayed for 3 nights and took a number of day hikes from our base camp.  Wonderful lake to swim in if you like cold water.  We had fish 2 nights for dinner thanks to my expert fisherman son-in-law.
directions: South from Stanley on Hwy 75 to the Pettit Lake Trail head.
title: Alice Lake Trail
